titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Therapeutic Medical Physicist Pay Cap Relief Act
Department of Veterans Affairs Therapeutic Medical Physicist Pay Cap Relief Act
Department of Veterans Affairs Therapeutic Medical Physicist Pay Cap Relief Act

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to codify the requirements for appointment, qualifications, and pay for therapeutic medical physicists of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
